items.content_html: Itertools is a Python module library that provides a wide range of tools for efficiently working with iterators and generators. One compelling element in the itertools library is its ability to work with infinite iterators. In this article, we will explore infinite iterators in itertools, their capabilities, and the typical scenarios in which they can be used.

items.content_html: In this article, Luis shares with readers his thoughts on the intersection of open source software and machine learning and what the future might bring. Many articles cover how open source software is used by the machine learning community but this post focuses on the similarities between the two areas of practice and what machine learning can and canâ€™t learn from open source software.
